text: Vin vstanovyv vam u relihiyi te, shcho zapoviv Nukhu, te, shcho My vidkryly tobi, te, shcho My zapovily Ibrahimu, Musi ta Isi: «Trymaytesya relihiyi ta ne rozkhodʹtesya pomizh soboyu v niy!» Vazhko bahatobozhnykam te, do choho ty zaklykayesh yikh. Allah obyraye Sobi toho, koho pobazhaye ta vede pryamym shlyakhom toho, khto do Nʹoho zvertayetʹsya
